    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder(@IdRes
               int id,
               @DrawableRes
               int fabImageResource)
        Creates a builder for a speed dial action item that uses the a DrawableRes as icon.

        This does Bitmap reading and decoding on the UI thread, which can cause a latency hiccup. If that's a concern, consider using Builder(int, Drawable) instead.

        Parameters:
        id - the identifier for this action item. The identifier must be unique to the instance of SpeedDialView. The identifier should be a positive number.
        fabImageResource - resId the resource identifier of the drawable

      • Builder

        public Builder(@IdRes
               int id,
               @Nullable
               android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable)
        Creates a builder for a speed dial action item that uses the a Drawable as icon.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier for this action item. The identifier must be unique to the instance of SpeedDialView. The identifier should be a positive number.
        drawable - the Drawable to set, or null to clear the content
